linear_Regression module

linear_Regression.calculate_linear_mse(data, m, q)[source]
linear_Regression.feature_scaling(data)[source]

This function takes a DataFrame ‘data’ and performs feature scaling on the ‘Close’ column and a newly created ‘Numerical_Index’ column. The scaled values are stored in new columns ‘Close_scaled’ and ‘Numerical_Index_scaled’.

Parameters:

data – pandas DataFrame, expected to have a ‘Close’ column.

Returns:

Modified pandas DataFrame with additional columns for scaled features.
